p.s: The given excerpt from the filming of the novel The Hate U Give by Angie Thomas, directed by George Tillmann Jr. in the year 2018, shows Chris coming to Starr at school.
They both had an argument before, because Chris had pulled out a condom last night.
At first Chris appears with giving his friends handshakes, until he sees Starr.
He comes to her but Starr is still angry because of last night and turns her back to Chris.
He puts his headphones on Starr's ears.
For a moment she gets a smile on her face but then she puts them off and tells him that she's not happy about what he did last night.
Chris says that he's sorry about that but a sorry is not enough for Starr.
So Chris takes out the headphones and turns the music loud and Starr laughs again.
It's like she forgot about what happened before.
